page.title: 16CUSTOMS
page.content: GAMES - STUCK IN THE MUD The game can be for any number of players.One person is it or two people, depending on the amount of players.When you say go! the person or people that are it run after the other people.When they touch the other people,they have to stand with their legs open.When another person who is running from the people that are it goes through their legs they are safe and can not become it.When you have been touched three times you become it.When everyone has been stuck and noone can free them the game starts again.You can play it anywhere but I play it outside at St. Paul's Church Hall with the guides mostly.
